section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition in No. 73-759, Edwards against Healy.
And for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court, the judgment of the District Court is vacated and the case is remanded to that Court to consider possible mootness in that case.
Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the decision.
